title: New games
brief_description: New games is a series of non-competitive games designed for the whole family, which have recently been introduced into Australia from America through the activities of Victoria’s Department of Youth, Sport and Recreation. New games includes a wide range of activities - from kite flying and human pyramid building to games with a giant earth ball.
